#summary This wiki describe the KEGG Pathway dataset

= KEGG Pathway = 

The *KEGG* !DataSet includes the [http://www.genome.jp/kegg/ KEGG] data source. This !DataSet includes the KEGG's Pathways, Compounds, Enzymes, Reactions, Glycans and Genes data. The next figure shows the main relational schema for the KEGG !DataSet dataset.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Pathway.png

The main table is the *KEGGPathway*. The figure shows the relationship between all KEGG data types. The next figure shows the relational schema for each kind of KEGG data type.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Pathway2.png
